note:
I’m just some guy on the internet. I have cats, dogs, and a number of turtles. I speaking English, een beetje Nederlands, and un poco de Español.

I have a degree in Physics, and actually worked in that field for a few years. I did particle accelerator design. After that computer consulting; Oracle mostly, but I did dabble in labor statistics.

Display name is from the soil where I live. It’s a black clay that soil scientists call “Houston Black-Heiden.”
